author: cms-sw
body: New root (6.18 and master) now look for library in the same directory as of the PCM. Existing build rules works for full release build but they fail for patch releases as they do not have biglib/arch/SimDataFormatsValidationFormats_xr_rdict.pcm .  New build rules make sure that if biglib/Simulation pluginis locally built then it also have the correct PCM
title: [BuildRules] To fix the failures in ROOT6 and 618 IBs
